bug.author: miguelgfierro
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/anargyri>@anargyri</denchmark-link> mentioned in regards to the SAR deep dive notebook: "The co-occurence matric $C$ has the following properties: It is symmetric, so $c_{i,j} = c_{j,i}$ It is nonnegative: $c_{i,j} >= 0$ The occurrences are at least as large as the co-occurrences. I.e, the largest element for each row (and column) is on the main diagonal: $∀(i,j) C_{i,i},C_{j,j}>=C_{i,j}$." The "&gt" does not render as a single symbol but as ">=". related to this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders/pull/156>#156</denchmark-link>
